alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 12 at 1:17PM PST until December 12 at 10:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM THIS EVENING ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow showers, gusty winds and low visibility at times in fog and blowing snow. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains and Riverside County Mountains. * WHEN...Through 10 PM today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to icy roads and poor visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains
